items.title: 07/06/10, 08.37p // 'your head-trip's boring me,'
items.content_html:
Today has been pretty much a nothing day except for the part when I got on SC when Mxxxx, Kxx, and Txxx were on, too. Mxxxxx was giving me trouble but I figured out how to fix that. No problems. :) photobucket wants $$ for: “themirror.jpg”

Oh, would you look at that? I just took a “test” called, “What Personality Disorder do you have?” just to see if it would get it right and it did. :D

My right leg is asleep and I wish that I could go back into the front room and watch more Lie to me*. I love Tim Roth; I haven’t yet finished the first season, which is something I need to do, but it seems to me that he has more of an accent than he did in the first season. Like there’s more emphasis on it. But hey, I’m not complaining; no worries. :)

I started making icons this morning and I completely forgot about them until now. I’ve still got CS3 open with all the pictures ready. I don’t know where my head has been. And I cleaned a part of my room today; mother had been nagging me to clean so I decided that I’d make a dent in it today. I like the result but I got dirt and dust in my eyes which was a small price to pay, I suppose. J and B like to pull out the stuffing in the two old blankets I’ve got on my bed so there was a lot of puffs of stuffing lying around. Those make my room feel even dirtier, I think. I¬†organized, or rather stuffed them all in a drawer, the cables and chargers that were getting tangled together. All the books that I’ve got bookmarks in are now all together on a little shelf-like structure next to my bed instead of them being everywhere and anywhere. I¬†need to vacuum now but that gets the dogs so riled up and plus, I don’t really feel like doing it, so there’s my reason. :)

I made more scars today and my cig burn is hardening. Hip, hip, hooray.
items.content_text:
Today has been pretty much a nothing day except for the part when I got on SC when Mxxxx, Kxx, and Txxx were on, too. Mxxxxx was giving me trouble but I figured out how to fix that. No problems. :) photobucket wants $$ for: "themirror.jpg" Oh, would you look at that? I just took a "test" called, "What Personality Disorder do you have?" just to see if it would get it right and it did. :D
"You May Be a Bit Borderline... Your mood swings make a roller coaster look tame! When you're up, you're a little bit crazy... And when you're down, your whole world is crashing Scary thing is, these moods can change by the minute!"
Yeah I know that I've got mood swings. They aren't as bad as they used to be since I'm on a medication for it. But they're still there and it's...challenging at times. I haven't been swinging as heavily as I was last week but this week has barely begun, so we'll see what happens! :D My right leg is asleep and I wish that I could go back into the front room and watch more Lie to me*. I love Tim Roth; I haven't yet finished the first season, which is something I need to do, but it seems to me that he has more of an accent than he did in the first season. Like there's more emphasis on it. But hey, I'm not complaining; no worries. :) I started making icons this morning and I completely forgot about them until now. I've still got CS3 open with all the pictures ready. I don't know where my head has been. And I cleaned a part of my room today; mother had been nagging me to clean so I decided that I'd make a dent in it today. I like the result but I got dirt and dust in my eyes which was a small price to pay, I suppose. J and B like to pull out the stuffing in the two old blankets I've got on my bed so there was a lot of puffs of stuffing lying around. Those make my room feel even dirtier, I think. "I'm a loser and a user and I don't need no accuser."
-- Green Day <3

items.title: 07/05/10, 09.13p // 'until my wounds are healed,'
items.content_html:
My cigarette burn is looking a bit different these days… The only word I can think of to describe it is ‘crispy.’ And it’s sensitive still.

I’m really afraid that I’ve gained weight since on the fourth someone brought over donuts and I¬†ate a few; I tried to get rid of one but it was really difficult. I’m too afraid to weigh myself; I don’t really want to know right now but I know that I’ll eventually force myself to do it and then I’ll see.

I need to go take care of a few things but I’ll come back and finish this entry.

I¬†guess I was supposed to hang out with someone today but as soon as I got home I went straight to bed and slept for over four hours. It seems like I’m getting increasingly tired as each day goes by even though I¬†take my morning meds that are supposed to help keep me awake.

“Depression is the inability to construct a future." photobucket wants $$ for: “322314.jpg”

“The public health authorities never mention the main reason many Americans have for smoking heavily, which is that smoking is a fairly sure, fairly honorable form of suicide.” – Kurt Vonnegut

mood: calm, currently playing: “Restless Heart Syndrome” - Green Day

It was an alright visit; it showed me what a life-long smoker looks like in her...80's? I'm not sure on her age but I have a feeling that she looks a lot older than she is. items.title: 07/04/10, 01.33a // 'Dreamwidth,'
items.content_html:
Signed up yesterday just in case since I’ve been hearing some distressing things about LJ.

I’d really, really, REALLY hate to lose anything in my journal over there. I’ve got too much.

And I feel so stupid - I just found out about The Slender Man. I fucking love him. (from livejournal): I set up cross-posting on DW and it works just the opposite of how I’d like it to work. I want my LJ entries to go to my DW account instead of the other way around. It’s a bummer. Anyway, that was the post I made.

So I¬†watched all the videos on Marble Hornet’s YT account…some real cool stuff there. I¬†meant what I said; I love The Slender Man. And FUCK. You know his symbol is the same as mine?? That’s so disappointing to me. But I’m not copying anything, I know that, so it’s alright.

I need to find a community that I can regularly contribute to. I don’t have any out of the handfuls of communities that I’m watching/a member of.

Later in the day, with fireworks and all, it’s going to be a bctih. They scare the dogs and just get annoying. All I want to do is try and photograph my brother while he lights sparklers. And that’s even if I feel like it. :b

I’m off to sleep! Wish me luck! ;)

(from wordpress): @ previous self, why the fcuk would one need to wish me luck w/that.. also i wonder if slenderman uses they/them bc that’d be…. (3___3)? (04/14/18)

mood: exhausted; exhausted, still, currently playing: “more fucking tegan and sara”; siri reading a book about child killers

items.title: 07/01/10, 05.46p // "'The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy,'"
items.content_html:
I’ve been spending all my time in my room on the Internet or watching Dexter. Chloe is the only one who really stays with me. She falls asleep next to me; sometimes we fall asleep together (her first). I feel dull, like an un-sharpened blade that’s just been left lying somewhere, collecting dust. I’m not saying that in reference to my intelligence, I’ve never thought of myself as smart or ‘as sharp as a knife.’ Something’s wrong with my memory, I think because of my eating habits (my ED…).

Yes, alright, I wish that I had a girlfriend but there’s too many complications for me to have one. I have issues with relationships: I want intimacy but I’m so very afraid of it, I have a lot of trouble verbally expressing my emotions, I can get clingy or needy because I’m afraid the person will leave me, I’m very insecure and have very low self-esteem (if those things weren’t already evident enough). I have a button on my jacket and it says, “I’m a Mess,” and I know that to be very true. And it’s also from the Everlong video (Dave had it pinned to his jacket at the beginning, looking punk-ish). :)

The only one who can fix this is me and I do desperately want to get better but nothing ever changes. I make a lot of effort during therapy but I’m just getting nowhere fast. But it’s not Dr. W.’s fault, if there’s anyone to blame, it’s definitely me. I have a hard time with change…I don’t know how.

Tomorrow I go to therapy at 10:00a and then my parents go by themselves at 4:00p to “check in” I suppose. I don’t know what good that’ll do. Now I’ve got some more Dexter to watch. My cigarette burn scar…I like it.

(Quote by Jim Rohn)

mood: tired,
items.content_text: I wonder what it's like to be in a stable, healthy relationship. I really do since I've never been in one before. Mine have pretty much all been dysfunctional, but I won't go into any details; those people are not important to me. My isolation has been getting to me. It's starting to feel like, well, I can only describe it with a part from American Psycho (the book), the part where Patrick had nailed another girl by her arms to a piece of wood and was just experimenting with her; he shoved his hand down her throat and pulled on the esophagus and her neck caved in. items.title: 06/30/10, 05.43p // 'i'm all burnt-out,'
items.content_html:
trigger warnings required,

I’m feeling very out of it right now. Last night I smoked my last cigarette; 7/7. Before I was done with it I took a breath and then put it out on my left arm. It burned but wasn’t that bad. Later on my mother told me that she could smell smoke on me and for some reason I showed her my arm. She insisted that I let her put some salve and a bandage on it, so I let her. When I got back to my room I took it off and wiped the salve away. This morning I checked my arm and the burn had turned into a bubble of some sort of liquid, so I broke it open with my fingernails and drained it. I wonder if I wasn’t supposed to do that… But it’s done; now it’s flat and round. I don’t know how it’ll turn out but don’t tell me, I want it to be a surprise. I’m not as huge a burner as I am a cutter but I do burn myself once in a very great while. Last time I had a hot glue gun and squeezed out some of it onto my arm. I don’t like burning, though for one simple reason: there isn’t any blood. I need blood as well as pain (if I ever feel it) in order to “feel better” about whatever it was that led me to do it.

This whole thing of me not having anyone to talk to, not having anyone around my neighbourhood or anywhere close, here, is beginning to get to me. I really wish that there were people “out there” I could meet in some way and actually become real friends with. If I really think about it, and if the definition of a friend is someone you can trust, be comfortable around and talk to, things like that, then I’ve never had a friend. The only person I can think of who fits that description is Exxxx and he lives in Sxxxxx Ixxxxx, all the way on the other side, which fucking sucks.

When I went to see Dr. Meds yesterday (my psychiatrist) he brought up relationships and told me that I wanted one. And in all honesty, yes, I do want to be in a relationship. A stable, mature relationship with someone who isn’t interested in making me their gay science project just so they can see if they are. The only “real life” relationships I’ve had turned out to be that way, which I think is really unfair. I didn’t know that I was an experiment until it was over and I was in the ER swallowing liquid charcoal and waiting to be transferred to Jxxx Gxxxxx (the holding place for the suicidal). “Call me pathetic, call me what you will,” that’s how bad it got for me and I’m not ashamed that it came to that. It’s just what happened. Since I was young I’ve always known that the way I’m going to die is by my own hand; I know this depression, all this shit will catch up to me and knock me down. I can’t avoid it forever. And I hate it when people say things like they don’t want you to kill yourself because they’ll be sad or miss you. They’ll be sad. Jesus Christ, sad? Then what do you think I am??

I got my new phone today. The only problem I’m having is that I keep running into problems activating it. But I like it; I’ll have to get used to it after having my old one for so long. I have a lot I need to get from my old phone to the new one now…that’s going to take some time, but I usually like doing those sorts of things. I used my picture-for-the-day from DailyBooth (see below) to take this picture. I wasn’t aiming for a real good shot since my webcam doesn’t specialize in high quality photos. My phone does, however. 5.1 megapixels - more than my mother’s digital camera has (4 mpx). It also has an actual flashlight that doubles as the flash for the camera, so I’ll be keeping this with me at night. :)

And lastly, yesterday I was on flickr looking over my friend Mxxxx’s photostream and she’d tagged me in a picture (I¬†still don’t know what to do when I get tagged on flickr…anyone?). In the description she’d posted a link to her new DailyBooth account. I’d been there before, maybe last year, but I didn’t think of getting an account. So I set up an account yesterday and found that it’s pretty fun. I’d encourage anyone with a zest for taking (mainly) self portraits to join. My Booth is dailybooth.com/tripto if you want to contact me so I can follow you. :) It’s fun, I promiseee.

Also, if anyone is interested, I’ve got skype for no real reason at all and I’ve been debating as to whether I should just uninstall it or try to find a use for it. That’s just me throwing that out there.

here's hoping you have a good day.

items.title: 06/27/10, 03.32p // 'gay pride; its hot outside,'
items.content_html:
photobucket wants $$ for: “RainbowFlag.jpg”

Today is the day of the Gay Pride Parade over in San Francisco. It started at 10:00a and I don’t know when it’ll end. I sort of wish that I could have gone but altogether it’s not such a big loss for me. I’d rather lie on my bed (speaking of which, I put my mattress back and put my flattened-out futon on top; comfy) and watch Dexter. It’s cool, quiet, and dark there. What more could I ask for? Better than being out in the sun around a huge amount of noisy people. I think I¬†made the right decision.

I don’t dream anymore, or so it seems. Rather, I dream but I can never remember what the dream was about. I can only remember one or two tiny details and that’s it. Like my dream last night; it was like I was playing Heavy Rain and I was about to make a move but something stopped me - and that’s all I can remember. Not much.

I would have been going to my summer classes tomorrow but I canceled them so I’ve got nothing to worry over anymore. I actually feared going to those classes because I’d have to be in close proximity with other people, they’d all be exercising and I’d run the risk of catching an elbow in the eye or some other form of accidental injury, and I would have had to wear shorts and a t-shirt eventually and I’m not too keen on displaying my legs and arms to other people. So now I don’t know what I’m going to do for the rest of the summer. My mother is worried that I’ll get bored but my worry is that I’ll become something of a burden again. I suppose the one utility that I use the most is electricity. Other than that I don’t really use up anything so no one can say that I mooch off of my parents.

I finally took Verizon up on that phone upgrade offer and ordered a new phone. Originally it was first priced at 450$ and then 50$ and by ordering it online that gave me a discount which put it down to 19.99$ (although I¬†had to pay the original tax for the phone when it was 450$, so that was around 45$…). It’s called the Casio Exilim and I can’t wait to get it. I like fiddling around with new things like that. It doesn’t have a keyboard but it has a 5.1 mpx camera, it’s water resistant up to one meter, and has a whole other set of features like ‘flashlight’ which intrigued me. So I’ll have that to look forward to, I suppose. :)

items.title: 06/25/10, 02.51p // 'tonight's the night,'
items.content_html:
I spent this whole week in my room going through seasons one through three of Dexter. The fourth season is out now and I’ll be getting that today. :) It wasn’t until I restarted the series that I realized that I’m almost exactly like Dexter. You’d have to know the character in order to know what I’m talking about but I¬†found it really surprising. All you have to do is replace ‘homicidal tendencies’ with ‘suicidal tendencies’. Pretty much.

I’ve been trying to draw lately and I¬†think the two things I’ve done so far… they meet my standards and that’s a good thing. That’s a bit obvious; if they didn’t then I wouldn’t consider them as progress. So far all I¬†can draw is what I know and what I know is myself, so that’s who I¬†draw. I hope to get away from myself and maybe start drawing one of my old characters again. Then if I¬†really like what I do I’ll submit whatever it is to dA and put that link here. Just thoughts swirling, that’s all. So far they’ve been unintentionally based on one thing that’d been bothering me for the week; smoking, self injury comments. I’m done with themes after that class I¬†took last semester.

So… my mother wants to watch The L Word - all six seasons - with me. And I¬†don’t have any problem with that. In fact, I’d like to watch it with someone else. Besides, I kind of miss it; I wish it was still going. I’ve been downloading everything (all one [zoom!]) for a week now and it’s now at XX.X%% which I¬†think is pretty good considering that it was stuck at XX% yesterday. I’ve got XX/XX seeders and XX/XXX [things]; [things] enabled. To be honest, when I¬†reached the end of the last episode I felt like I’d lost a good friend (dumb, right?). (SPOILERS.) I hate that Shane and Jenny got together; I’ve always disliked Jenny and Shane had always been my favourite. I’m glad that Jenny died, she was really terrible.

Alright, so I¬†went to Target and Best Buy in search of the fourth season of Dexter but I’ve now found that it’s not out yet. I don’t know why I¬†thought it was out and now I feel like an even bigger idiot. Oh well, off to… do hell knows what.

items.title: 06/24/10, 12.26p // experiment #5,
items.content_html:
Out with my father. He’s a [job description]. I usually end up falling asleep towards the ends of the trips out. I’ve only managed not to fall asleep once out of, oh, seven or so times, I think. I don’t like the fact that I’m using up my battery right now. I feel that it always has to be plugged-in. And I can’t see the screen very well. I was playing Green Day but I haven’t organised their discography yet. I put it in my folders and it multiplied into many other folders in my Zune software. So now I’ve got to fix everything - which I like to do - but it’s not gonna work with my father here and my being in the car. So I switched over to the only Beatles album I bothered to keep, which is Yellow Submarine, for personal reasons. I wish I was back in bed watching Dexter and cuddling with my dog. She’s the one who woke me up in the first place this morning but I’m not holding it against her.

I’m feeling very… drained. All that psychobabble, really? (See: ‘exp. #4’s comments.) Emotionally drained, to be specific. I find it hard to focus on how I physically feel. I’ve been finding several bruises on my legs that I don’t remember getting. I think they’re from my legs knocking against eachother. And my futon is now flat and it’s just like sleeping on the floor now, maybe I’ll switch back to my mattress.

My mother is trying to get me to admit that I’ve got an eating disorder. And that’s not me admitting it, because, granted there are certain eating disordered behaviours I’ve noticed that I’ve got but I’m not anoretic nor bulimic. Haven’t I gone over this before? My memory is really going; I’m really afraid to… you know what? Fuck it. I’m going to cancel those classes.

There, that’s done.

I’m getting a bit dizzy and I can feel a headache coming on if I don’t go back to bed so I’ll wrap this up. My collection of Diet Coke cans is bigger than last week’s. I’m gonna go add to it some more.

mood: drained, currently playing: “Okay, I believe you but my Tommy Gun Don’t” - Brand New

items.title: 06/21/10, 04.21p // experiment #4,
items.content_html:
trigger warnings required,

Emery: If one doesn’t know what it’s like to be a self-harmer then this request would seem stupid. But you have to look at it from others' point of view: seeing pictures of other self-harmer’s scars can be very triggering. And for those who would like to avoid being triggered by such images it’s unfair to those of us who are trying to stop. Like if you were trying to quit smoking, would you like someone posting pictures of other people smoking? It’s a real addiction whether you like it or not and it should be recognized as one. There’s also the jealousy & competitive part of the addiction; seeing someone’s scars you can’t help but compare theirs to your own and wonder who’s are better.

(Quoted) A trigger is an event that pushes a person over the edge and leads them to seek immediate relief through self-harm. A trigger can be an external event, such as an argument, or an internal event, like remembering a traumatic time.

Or pictures. Especially pictures.

I know what you’re saying about pictures of non self-inflicted injuries and I wouldn’t take down pictures like that either. The difference between self-inflicted injuries and non self-inflicted ones are pretty clear. And they’re especially clear to self harmers. I’d also imagine that the person who posted the photo would add that something happened to them or that the scar in the picture was from surgery.

The photo that Mxxxx, one of your mods, posted was a picture of her arm with the words, “You don’t want this” above it. That, to me, is a pretty clear unwarranted advertisement of self harm.

This isn’t a black-and-white issue, either. There are such things as compromises.

Thanks for discussing it, too. Jesus Christ, why is this even being put into question? Even though this forum is run by 18-19 year olds, I¬†feel way older than I am. I’m not saying that I’m more mature (well, actually…) or more intelligent than the others, I¬†just think that everything I had to explain to Kxx was common sense. Then again, I¬†saw that when that picture was posted, she mentioned that she “only had two [scars].” Now, I’m neither proud nor ashamed of the fact that I’m a self harmer, I’ve just accepted that it’s something that I do. I think it’s safe to say that after around two and a half years of doing it, I¬†know what I’m talking about and that I’m not wrong. Honestly, I¬†wouldn’t be surprised if half of the people who came from EB started cutting because of that site and because they thought that it was a very “emo” thing to do. I know that that isn’t true for me because I started for a different reason; god, I¬†was a stupid child.

So I¬†think I handled it pretty well. I didn’t get angry, I was calm and thought about my reply. Oh, I¬†think I’ll just go pat myself on the back now. ;) I think I¬†should include Kxx’s whole response, just for fun. :)

Yeah i know this is kinda different…but its like i said..it not as if a video of the action was posted. Its scars. Anyone could have gotten them anywhere.

Offensive material can not always be blocked…. Think about it If a christian member came on the board and posted about god everywhere, I would be offended. At the same time, they would be offended at my distaste for religion. Would both members be unable to post their opinions?

What if someone completely obsessed with justin bieber came on the forum and took offense to the justin bieber thread and asked we remove it? Could we do that?

Offensive material will be everywhere…. Thats just my point

As a mod, its my job to make sure members are happy and not offended and i am going to do my best to do that, but we cant delete EVERY post that might get on someones wrong side.

I think thats my entire opinion but im on my phone at work so i forget half of what i typed xD >.>,

Opinion made, i will tell you that us mods are in discussion on what to do to make everyone happy.

<3

mood: hot, currently playing: “Peacemaker” - Green Day

items.title: 06/09/10, 01.07p // "have not, want not,"
items.content_html:
In the time that I haven’t posted I’ve been having internet connection problems. I¬†go to this site where I watch streaming films and I’ve been going there for a little over a year now. In the last week the connection has gotten really slow and the videos just won’t load. Or they will load but it’ll take half the day to do so. I managed to watch American Psycho & The Descent Part 2 and that was it.

I’m reading Bret Easton Ellis' American Psycho as well as watching the film for the second time (I really like it). I¬†remember the time I first started to watch it and I got as far as the scene with the “Kristie” and “Sabrina” but after that I stopped for some reason. It really helps to have read the book before watching the film since there are so many little things that can slip right past you if you haven’t. Christian Bale is magnificent in it & he is in general. :)

I’m going back to Blackwing (Tattoo & Piercing) with my mother since she wants to get a tragus piercing. Back when I got my industrial, I¬†was supposed to go back in two weeks for a sort of “check-up” but… I¬†forgot and didn’t go. I hope that they don’t say anything. The guy who does the piercings is named Tony and he has done both my lip piercings (at different times) and my industrial. A guy named Eric (it wasn’t spelled that way but I can’t remember how since he doesn’t work there anymore - seemingly a sore subject amongst the staff) pierced my left ear (in two places). I¬†don’t know if I’ll get another piercing… what is there to get? I absolutely hate nose piercings and I can’t think of anything else… I¬†don’t think I¬†want anymore piercings right now. I¬†want two tattoos: the name Chloe tattoo’d on my left inner wrist & a pok√©ball somewhere on my right arm (I’m not sure). Both have meaning to me and I know that they’re things I won’t regret getting. Now all I need is the money. :)

I’m off to Blackwing now! :)

I¬†also got the fourth season of Prison Break since my brother has practically given up on watching the show with me. I’m just going to go on by myself and finish it. items.title: 05/24/10, 02.02p // "'the artful life' final paper," ‚úèÔ∏è [WIP]
items.content_html:
And I’ve been watching The L Word which has turned me into a lesbian. ;)* Shane is <3333.

xxxxxxxxxxxxx

The work I've chosen to compare and contrast with two films, poems, and songs that were discussed in class is the 2004 film The Machinist, directed by Brad Anderson and written by Scott Kosar. Featuring Christian Bale as the lead character, the film is about Trevor Reznik, a machinist, has severe, chronic insomnia (he has not slept for a year) and has been losing weight to the point of emaciation. The people at his place of work are put off both by his appearance and his demeanor, always trying to ignore him. After a terrible accident (caused by Trevor) costs a co-worker's arm, Trevor is, in a way, exiled from his workplace by his co-workers and his station in the factory becomes his own small island. Trevor says he was distracted by an unfamiliar face, a man he had never seen at the factory, right before he caused the accident. He tells this to his superiours and the persons who were called to discuss the accident but of course, when Trevor tells his boss, knowing the name of the man, that Ivan (the new guy, right?) was the one who distracted him, he gets the response, "There is no Ivan working here." And now you know that something has gone seriously wrong, especially when Trevor is able to catch up to Ivan and talk to him face-to-face. From there things seem to unravel, he keeps losing weight, writing the newest low number on a post-it and sticking it to the wall in front of the scale. He finds little comfort in the arms of a girl he's been seeing, a prostitute named Stevie. She seems to be the only one who he can find some sort of solace in, her and the woman who works at the airport diner, Maria. "If you were any thinner, you wouldn't exist," says Stevie. The next time he sees Maria at the diner, she says the exact same thing. Everything is going too fast and flashes of something keeps popping up at different times. Disorienting. I chose this film because the first time I saw it, I could tell from the instant Christian Bale appeared that I was going to like this film. One of the kinds that grab you before you get a chance to brace yourself.

For the film comparison and contrast part of this paper, I've chosen Pan's Labyrinth and Apocalypse Now. So as to not be repeating the titles over and over again, I'll cut down the names of the films using the first letters of each word. So starting with the former, in comparison, I'd first have to point out that both films are dark in their own way. TM has little saturation; the colours have been sapped out of the moving images. PL is just plain dark, in every sense of the word, too. The skies are always grey and sunshine does not exist in these two worlds. Although PL deals with real mystical creatures and demons, TM deals with different sorts of demons. Insomnia, memory loss (or was the memory even there to begin with?), hallucinations: he's here, he's there but at the same time he's nowhere, he's not here. Not anymore, anyways. Pan, a looming figure over young Ofelia, gives her three tasks to complete before the full moon, having to do with his believing that she is the reincarnation of Princess Moanna. This will supposedly make sure that her "essence is intact" and that she will be able to return to her father's realm. Trevor has to go through a series of things that slowly restore his memory until he is able to piece together what has caused his insomnia for a year, what he has blocked out, simply forgotten, but a part of him has not as is evident upon seeing his physical appearance. In contrast to PL, Trevor has done something that he is being punished for, even if he doesn't know it just yet. Ofelia has done nothing but lead a miserable life full of fear, hate, tears. Ofelia tries to do good, does do good, and ultimately is rewarded for all her efforts.¬† The woman who works at the airport diner, Maria, invites Trevor to go to a theme park for Mother's Day. Just her and her son, Nicholas; he agrees to go as well. The day is no different from all the others in terms of appearance. They are at a theme park; the sun is blocked by the ever present grey clouds pasted in the sky. But still people are having a good time, smiling and screaming and wasting their money on things that will only last them a small while. Trevor takes Maria's son for a walk; Maria herself received a phone call and had to take it. The two come across an attraction suspiciously entitled "Route 666;" Nicholas is intrigued. Using a medium shot showing both the man and boy, the small cart weaves its way through the halls of plastic and mechanical horror, the scenery becomes more extreme by the minute; blatant murders, graves, suicides. A fork in the tracks appears: the one on the right all lit up white with a sign offering heaven, solace. The other one that leads off to the left continues deeper into hell. "Right, a right!" Trevor yells out loud but of course the ride delves into the darker of the two tunnels. Suddenly strobe lights start to flicker at too fast a speed and Maria's son begins to seize. Trevor rushes out of the ride with Nicholas in arms and cries out for help as liquid white foam drips from the boy's lips. His mother rushes over, puts the boy's head in her lap and tells Trevor, "He is epileptic. I should have told you." Still feeling guilty, cold sweat runs down Trevor's back; he drives the two of them back to their home. All of this is linked to the repressed memory that keeps Trevor from sleep. You see, unlike Ofelia, Trevor has done wrong, a great wrong and no matter how hard he tried to make things right the truth finally catches up to him. Ofelia's ending is that trying her hardest to outrun her step-father and complete the final of the three tasks asked of her by Pan she doesn't physically make it as she is shot by the step-father. I say that she physically doesn't make it because her body was stopped at the top of the stairs leading down to the carved stone but her blood does make it and with just that she enters her real father's realm and is given a good ending. A good ending borne out of tragedy. With Trevor it is the opposite in a way, but nothing good comes of anything in his story. The memory returns after things have become clear to him, like the woman at the airport diner isn't Maria but the woman working there still knows him as well as she did. Maria was the mother of Nicholas who was the boy Trevor accidentally killed in a hit and run. And everything flips, turns upside down. Trevor drives himself to the police station and turns himself in. The last you see of Trevor is him finally sleeping soundly in a jail cell, the burden lifted from his shoulders. Two different endings but one could say that they both turned out as good endings, the ending of PL is obvious but the ending of TM could both be good for Christian Bale's character and for the mother who lost her son.

In comparing The Machinist to Apocolypse Now, there are some similarities, some things that I'm able to put together. Guilt, lies, something eating at you from the inside. In contrast, TM did not have many transitions, fades, cuts to black that AN had. Both have a large psychological aspect to them and both don't try to disguise it. Trevor's insomnia and his guilt, Captain Benjamin L. Willard's drinking and the burden that war puts on your shoulders. Willard has to chase after insanity while Trevor has to run from it.

It's easier to compare films to films but when film is compared to things like poetry and music, chances of succeding get a bit dicey-er than usual. For the poetry comparison and contrast portion, I'll be using the soliloquy, from Hamlet spoken in the play by Prince Hamlet, which starts out with the famous words, "To be or not to be." Now to compare this to The Machinist will take some thinking. There is always the psychological aspect of each, the type in TM I've explained; Hamlet is talking to himself about whether or not he should kill himself - a pretty heavy thing to be pondering about if you ask me. Trevor never considers suicide, that wouldn't help anything seeing as he isn't suicidal, everything is just falling apart. However, relating to Trevor's insomnia, there is this: "And, by opposing, end them. To die, to sleep No more ‚Äì and by a sleep to say we end The heartache and the thousand natural shocks That flesh is heir to ‚Äì ‚Äòtis a consummation Devoutly to be wished. To die, to sleep To sleep, perchance to dream. Ay, there's the rub, For in that sleep of death what dreams may come…" Trevor may just as well have been looking for that sleep, "that sleep of death."

Lou Reed's "Romeo Had Juliette," to me, reflects the image of dark alley ways, lit up and then discarded and dirtied crack pipes, a doomed fate that you cannot run from no matter how hard you try. The imagery that went with Reed's poem especially helped in forming this image of the black and white, love and hate that oozes down grey brick walls and spreads out all over the blackened cement. Gravity pulls Romeo to Juliette for an instant and in the next moment it forces them apart just as hope had begun to rise in their hearts. Gravity pulls Nicolas' body down from it's temporary flight caused by Trevor's red sportscar and makes him know how much control it has over him, over everything. The gravity of the incident causes Trevor to peel away from the scene, causes him to block out the memory just as soon as it brings it back to light.

"Mother," the very interesting song sung by the very interesting John Lennon; he screams, he yells. His emotion can no longer be put into words, they can no longer be kept inside. In contrast, Trevor, if he feels anything at all, keeps everything inside and lets nothing out. "'Cause We Ended As Lovers" by Stevie Wonder. "'Cause we've ended now as lovers, Doesn't mean that we each other can't be friends. 'Cause we've ended now as lovers, Does our love for one another have to end?" Trevor and Stevie had a relationship that had been going on for awhile, a year or longer. Confusion, disorientation separates them and he makes it impossible to reverse the damage he has done to that relationship. She was a prostitute and gave that life up to be with him; he told her that she could go back to that life because it seemed to him like she was keeping secrets from him, that she knew Ivan but never told Trevor about that (was he her ex-boyfriend? The one who called?). The song gives a spark of hope to the singer's relationship with the one she parted with - that will not happen between Stevie and Trevor. On one hand there is damage that can be fixed and turned into friendship and on the other hand there is irreversable damage, like breaking a mirror and trying to put all the shards back together again: impossible.

All in all, there is something that either film, poem, or song can be compared to. Sometimes it's as simple as "happy" versus sad, contentment versus depression, life versus death or light versus dark.

mood: nervous, currently playing: “Maxwell’s Silver Hammer” - The Beatles (*edit: 04/09/18)
items.content_text: So I wrote my 6-8 page paper for my humanities class and I¬†like how it came out. I feel like posting it here even though no one will know what I'm talking about. ;D And I've been watching The L Word which has turned me into a lesbian. ;)* Shane is <3333. xxxxxxxxxxxxx The work I've chosen to compare and contrast with two films, poems, and songs that were discussed in class is the 2004 film The Machinist, directed by Brad Anderson and written by Scott Kosar. Featuring Christian Bale as the lead character, the film is about Trevor Reznik, a machinist, has severe, chronic insomnia (he has not slept for a year) and has been losing weight to the point of emaciation. The people at his place of work are put off both by his appearance and his demeanor, always trying to ignore him. After a terrible accident (caused by Trevor) costs a co-worker's arm, Trevor is, in a way, exiled from his workplace by his co-workers and his station in the factory becomes his own small island. Trevor says he was distracted by an unfamiliar face, a man he had never seen at the factory, right before he caused the accident. He tells this to his superiours and the persons who were called to discuss the accident but of course, when Trevor tells his boss, knowing the name of the man, that Ivan (the new guy, right?) was the one who distracted him, he gets the response, "There is no Ivan working here." And now you know that something has gone seriously wrong, especially when Trevor is able to catch up to Ivan and talk to him face-to-face. items.title: 05/20/10, 03.47p // "school on the brain,"
items.content_html:
For music I¬†have to take the final since the teacher told me that if I¬†turn in two more concert reports at the most I’d get a B (which is fine with me) but I’ll take the final just in case. And for that humanities class I’ve got a 7-12 page paper due next Monday… fuck. I’ll have to do as much as I¬†can, which will prob’ly be about two pages if I double space it) and then I’ll have to just bullshit it all. I’d rather take a final for that class, it’d prob’ly be easier.

So I¬†guess all I have on my mind today are school related things. I’ve got my phone so hopefully the alarm will go off when I¬†need it to so I¬†don’t accidentally miss another concert. And I¬†hate going to these concerts - I¬†do not like jazz. It all sounds the same to me and it’s all blaring noises and screeching instruments and all I can think about is how much saliva is going into those things and how unpleasant it would be to clean them out. Ech.
items.content_text:
<!--more read-more,--> Ah, things have been... well, they haven't been bad or hectic, really. These last couple weeks classes have been winding down. I've only got 2/5 left. <s>Art, Yoga, Gay and Lesbian Literature,</s> Music 1, and The Artful Life. Technically, I've still got to take the final for that Gay literature class, but the teacher, who's been the best teacher I've ever had, was very lenient and gave the class three options: not take the final & he'd make every assignment worth 5 points more, go to class and take the final, or take the final online which'll be timed. I've picked the last one and I hope that I can remember it, I've been keeping notes of the little things I need to do everyday since I forgot about one of those jazz concerts and missed it even though I'd already bought a ticket (my 7$ nooo!). So no I¬†really don't trust my memory... not that I didn't before, but I'm really concerned now. Like, I¬†have to go to another jazz concert tonight (which I¬†really don't want to) and I'm afraid that I'm going to forget about that.

For music I¬†have to take the final since the teacher told me that if I¬†turn in two more concert reports at the most I'd get a B (which is fine with me) but I'll take the final just in case. And for that humanities class I've got a 7-12 page paper due next Monday... fuck. I'll have to do as much as I¬†can, which will prob'ly be about two pages if I double space it) and then I'll have to just bullshit it all. I'd rather take a final for that class, it'd prob'ly be easier.

So I¬†guess all I have on my mind today are school related things. I've got my phone so hopefully the alarm will go off when I¬†need it to so I¬†don't accidentally miss another concert. And I¬†hate going to these concerts - I¬†do not like jazz. It all sounds the same to me and it's all blaring noises and screeching instruments and all I can think about is how much saliva is going into those things and how unpleasant it would be to clean them out. Ech.

Ultimately that’s what made me feel better. At least for now. Now I’m watching Psycho III with my father. It’s terrible but it’s got a very young Jeff Fahey in it. :)

Well, that’s about it for my boring update. Maybe I’ll convince him to watch Joy Ride while we’re at it.
items.content_text: I have to say that today wasn't all that spectacular. I woke up too late to play L4D2 with E-Man, went to therapy (which I've found usually ends up ruining my day sooner or later), went to Target and got a new mic and... watched UP in an attempt to boost myself out of this depression, which didn't work. I managed not to fall asleep which is unusual for me. I decided to run around the backyard for a bit listening to The Lonely Island, which I think that [livejournal user] meaanima would approve of. ;) Ultimately that's what made me feel better. At least for now. Now I'm watching Psycho III with my father. It's terrible but it's got a very young Jeff Fahey in it. :) Well, that's about it for my boring update. Maybe I'll convince him to watch Joy Ride while we're at it.

items.title: 05/13/10, 11.23a // paperblog 02,
items.content_html:
trigger warnings required,

March 31

Alright, tell me what’s wrong with [that] statement? Technically speaking, we don’t all breathe the same air, but if I seriously say that, I’m being [st*pid]. But we don’t, period. “We” don’t feel the same emotions; I’m betting no one in this room has felt what I’ve felt in the sense of loss of identity. What gender am I? (Neither, both; there’s more than two genders). That’s the thought that first comes to me. Anyone can become depressed - anyone can say that they’re depressed when they’re really not. I¬†think I can tell if people are lying about that or not, but then again, sometimes I can just tell things about people, but not always. Sometimes I’m right or close but a lot of the time I’m wrong.

  • Okay.. I¬†don’t know what kind of state my mind was in when I¬†wrote this, but it was obviously far, far away. And that second-to-last sentence is terrible. I’m ashamed of myself.

April 20

I’m very happy with my camera if I haven’t already said so.

  • Crzy! I don’t recognize that crzy person.

May 4

I¬†know I have no future. I’ve known that for a long time. I’ve never been one to fuss over my grades but I’ve been put on academic probation 1 and if I don’t get As or Bs in all of my classes this semester, I¬†guess I won’t be allowed to go to college anymore? College, anyway.

In art class, my art isn’t up to par w/the teacher’s expectations (she wants everything to be professional). Last class I got bad-mouthed in front of the whole class bc my projects didn’t exactly match and weren’t matted to a board (they were made of regular printer paper and I used clear tape as a try at laminating them).

The thought that “it’s not worth it” keeps popping up. My mother makes me eat, I can’t lose weight, I’m on medication that “helps” by numbing all feelings instead of just depression, that medication makes me tired so in the morning (after taking Klonopin and Risperdal before bed) I take medication that’s intended for people with ADHD to wake me up. I think I’m going to stop taking all my medication and instead of storing it, I’ll just throw them away. I can’t take this shit anymore.

  • I¬†feel like I¬†should apologize for this one. So, I’m really sorry about this one. I¬†don’t know what was happening or where I was or any of that. And I hate all the grammatical errors. ;) I haven’t stopped taking my meds, I know better than that. And I’m not going to attempt anything. Pinky promise.

May 12 “It’s only called ‘transgender’ if the person has had a sex-change. [They’d/That’d] be a transvestite." - Alisha (or “[Some] girl in my humanities class”), TAF.

(We watched a DVD of poets reciting their poems in little music video like takes called The United States of Poetry and the idiot class' responses weren’t surprising.)

“She needs to be on some meds or something.” “She’s bipolar." “Emotion Idiot” - Maggie Estep

I personally liked both of them. :)

mood: exhausted, currently playing: “Boombox (feat. Julian Casablancas)” - The Lonely Island

But I went to Music this morning and I'm in gay class [Gay and Lesbian Lit.] now. :( My camera arrived yesterday and it's excellent. It's sitting inches away from me now...I want to start using it more. I¬†weighed myself last week. The electronic one read: XXXlbs and the other was around that area. FUCK!! My weight is supposed to be going DOWN not up! I need to start using my jump-rope every day, maybe two times a day at least. All I¬†eat is Special K cereal and drink Diet Coke. If I slip and binge then I immediately purge all I can. I'm sick of being so fat! I'm not 'happy' with the way my body is, I¬†don't care if I'm not in the "normal" weight range for my height. That doesn't matter to me, fuck. I'm going to walk home. Hopefully that'll do something. I'm very happy with my camera if I haven't already said so.
- Cr*zy! I don't recognize that cr*zy person. May 4
I¬†know that I'm good at nothing but wasting time, money, and resources. I watched a film called 2 Days w/Paul Rudd; the main character decides to kill himself and document it on film. He tried to do it by sitting in the car, you know, a hose from the tail pipe to the window and start the engine. He, at the "last minute" backed out and opened the car door and gets to the hospital. The film ends on a note of "hope" and even though I love Paul Rudd, I wanted [his] character to succeed. Despite that disappointment, it gave me an idea. I can use a hose and do the same thing in the car in the garage. It's so fucking tempting. I don't know if I'd wake anyone up when I start the engine - I¬†hope not. That'll be my next attempt - but I'll wait until after Friday (when I¬†see Dr. W) so I¬†can talk about it first. Unless things get worse before then. I¬†know I have no future. I've known that for a long time. I've never been one to fuss over my grades but I've been put on academic probation 1 and if I don't get As or Bs in all of my classes this semester, I¬†guess I won't be allowed to go to college anymore? College, anyway. In art class, my art isn't up to par w/the teacher's expectations (she wants everything to be professional). Last class I got bad-mouthed in front of the whole class bc my projects didn't exactly match and weren't matted to a board (they were made of regular printer paper and I used clear tape as a try at laminating them). The thought that "it's not worth it" keeps popping up. My mother makes me eat, I can't lose weight, I'm on medication that "helps" by numbing all feelings instead of just depression, that medication makes me tired so in the morning (after taking Klonopin and Risperdal before bed) I take medication that's intended for people with ADHD to wake me up. I think I'm going to stop taking all my medication and instead of storing it, I'll just throw them away. I can't take this shit anymore.
- I¬†feel like I¬†should apologize for this one. So, I'm really sorry about this one. I¬†don't know what was happening or where I was or any of that. And I hate all the grammatical errors. ;) I haven't stopped taking my meds, I know better than that. And I'm not going to attempt anything. Pinky promise. May 12 "It's only called 'transgender' if the person has had a sex-change. [They'd/That'd] be a transvestite." - Alisha (or "[Some] girl in my humanities class"), TAF.
LOLOLOLOLOLOLOL!
(We watched a DVD of poets reciting their poems in little music video like takes called The United States of Poetry and the idiot class' responses weren't surprising.) "She needs to be on some meds or something." "She's bipolar." "Emotion Idiot" - Maggie Estep
"Is that poetry?!" "He looks like a sick psycho person askin' [someone] to drip candle wax on his nipples!" "You'd find someone like him in Berkley." "My Lover" - John S. Hall I personally liked both of them. :) mood: exhausted, currently playing: "Boombox (feat. Julian Casablancas)" - The Lonely Island

items.title: 05/04/10 // 12.19p
items.content_html:
There’s this one spot on my back that I can’t seem to crack and it’s bothering me. I went to class today (Music 1) and watched Immortal Beloved. It’s about Beethoven; so far, all I¬†can tell is that he has died and left a letter to his ‘immortal beloved’ and his closest friend goes out to find out who that was. We didn’t finish it but the whole time I¬†was watching it I was heavily comparing it to Amadeus…. I¬†couldn’t help it. And do you know what the verdict was? You already know. ;)

And I wore a V-neck t-shirt to class. I’ve never done that before, not even in my own home. I saw that the size was medium and so it’s a little big on me (it’s just the shirt, I wear medium usually) and I wear a black binder so that was very visible. I don’t think that anyone would’ve guessed what it was; I wonder if my mother knows I¬†wear one? I think that’s one of the things she won’t talk about. And that’s fine with me.

Yesterday I started this sort of exercise routine where I go out to the backyard an hour or two before dinner and I (try to) do 10 tiny laps around the grass (the dogs think that that means I’m chasing them), instead of using a jump rope, since it’s too noisy & scares the dogs, I just jump 100 times, then I do 25-30 ‘jumping jacks’. Or at least that’s what I did yesterday. Then I do the same thing after dinner. I feel like this is something that I could really get into without losing interest. I¬†have to sort of encourage & push myself towards the end. We’ll see if I can keep this up.

And lastly, tomorrow is my friend’s birthday, so I¬†hope that I get done making whatever it is that I’m going to make for him on time. My limited options are icons, banners, wallpapers, and .gifs, really. I’m leaning more towards trying to make a really good gif. A gif gift…. :)
items.content_text: Egh, looking at my last post & the pictures I put up makes me feel like I tainted my journal bc you can see what they look like... I'll take those down. :> So I have a new layout. :) I like it. I've already forgotten where it's from, but I'll make sure to find out & credit. items.title: 04/26/10, 06.14p // paperblog 01,
items.content_html:
“Campbell Scott’s performance - last week people in class, teacher included, kept saying the way that he acted was “crzy”. Someone used “psychopath” but the teacher suggested “psychotic”. Someone else said he was the closest to killing himself bc he cut himself. And the performance was called “crzy” again.

Last Friday I told Dr. W about this and how it made me feel; he said that it was like, if the students watched calling someone ugly, fat, stupid. Those kinds of remarks. (What makes you say that? “I don’t know, I just think they’re ugly/stupid/fat/‘cr*zy.'") People are ignorant fools. At least the ones in my class are.”

So I¬†thought that I’d share that. Because. Take care. :)

mood: blank,

items.title: 04/17/10, 12.40p // my bpd is showing,
items.content_html: I’ve been going off on impulses, such as getting a hold of my card and going on eBay for hours at a time. I suppose that I’m an impulsive shopper. Something else to add to my BPD list. I’ve been waiting for a new camera, the Canon Rebel XSi 12mpx w/lens & at the price I purchased it at, it’s worth it bc it’s coming with five ‘bonus’ items: carrying case, cleaning kit, two 8GB SD cards, SD card reader, and my favourite, a table tripod. All for roughly around 550$: the most I’ve ever spent. I’ve also been collecting photos and prints from Amadeus and my most.. cherished :) one is an actual photograph (not printed from a computer, not a print, an actual photo) of Tom Hulce in full regalia (the icon I’m using for this post is from the photo) - and I’ve ordered frames for all of them. So four prints, one photo, and one mini-poster. I bought “Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart: A Biography” written by Piero Melograni (1997) and I can’t put it down. Well, I can, but I have to have it near me. It’s sitting to my left as I type. It’s so absolutely absorbing; I love it. I recently discovered a series of graphic novels called ‘Wet Moon’ by Ross Campbell and her art is fantastic, so I ordered all five. See? Impulsive shopper, right? I seriously need to stop. And I think I have.. I think. At least I hope so. My reading list is getting longer and longer as I keep adding books to it. I think I’ve over ten books that I’ve started but haven’t finished yet. Summer projects, maybe? Rather, summer.. goals, I’d think. Oh! Also I ordered a Firefly graphic novel, the entire series on DVD, and Serenity. Those are things that I pretty much need, right? ;) I thought so. Alan Tudyk and Nathan Fillion are amazing, don’t you think? :) I need to keep on making icons, can’t lose that too. I want to get better at it. I made some banner-ish things for the forum I live at and I think that the last two I¬†made came out pretty well. I’ll shove them under a cut if you’d like to take a look. And right! My old high school, (what you need to know: christian, bigoted, homophobic, racist, discriminatory, ‘traditional’; in short: fucked up) sent me a post card asking me to fill out a survey. I couldn’t help but grin when I saw what it was…. alright, I just took the survey. I gave them permission to track my ‘token number’ so they’ll know who filled it out. I can imagine them just ignoring mine. Take a look at the site if you are so inclined. My brother (who is 16 years old) has just taught me how to outline text (like in the second one) and I went from there. What I’m working with is only Photoshop 7.0, I hope to upgrade to at least CS3 sometime soon. And the same with ImageReady (I’ve got 7.0 - upgrade to CS3?). And the photos I used for those graphics were stock images, my camera isn’t here yet, so I can’t take those kind of photos. ;)

items.title: 04/05/10, 09.17p // so today i woke up &,
items.content_html:
I haven’t made any graphics lately, not that it matters, really. My friend Mxxxx over at Sxxxxxxx Cxxxx has started to make some pretty good looking banners. So now she and Mxxxx are putting me to shame with their superior banners. Egad. I really want to make graphics for someone or something; Mxxxx asked me to make a SC-promoting banner for her and I made four versions for her to pick from. So that was a good start but I need a lot more practice.

You know, I sometimes wish that I wasn’t as poor as I am, I’m fortunate to still have a home and all, don’t get me wrong, but sometimes I wish we had a bit more. I’m jealous of Mxxxx’s excellent photography. I really am. I used to practise photography but that got lost in translation along with my art. I’m not very good at anything anymore. But to stay on-topic, I wish that I could take photographs as well as she can. All I¬†have is a Canon PowerShot A590 8mpx digital camera. Maybe if I get the green light I’ll be able to get a better camera. I hope so. I think that would help me.

items.title: 03/26/10, 02.20p // icons/graphics post: heavy rain, shutter island, misc, [WIP]
items.content_html:
[9] Norman Jayden Banners [2] Norman Jayden [2] Shutter Island [8] Soothing Chaos [5] Miscellaneous

  • Monty Python
  • Lady GaGa
  • Inglourious Basterds
  • Cityscape
  • Record Store

Made these icons quite awhile ago and I¬†haven’t been around to update my LJ in quite a long time, I’m afraid, so these are quite overdue. As soon as the game came out I’ve been playing Heavy Rain and I’m absolutely head-over-heels in love with it. And with all the characters except for one (he knows who he is). Norman Jayden, agent 49023 FBI, is my favourite character right next to Ethan Mars, father of Shaun Mars. God, I’ve never loved a game like I love HR. And I even like the third character, Madison Paige. I¬†usually don’t like female characters in video games since it seems like they never have a brain but boy does this one have one. And she can kick ass, too. Did I mention that I’m seriously in love? ;]

So to begin, I made a few icons of Norman; I¬†hope to make a lot more featuring more of the characters as screenshots are released and I actually work on something. Ethan should be next, I¬†hope. Shutter Island: I¬†read the book before seeing the film and I loved both. My favourite line has got to be when Leo/ Teddy Daniels says, “We are two duly appointed Federal Marshals” when they’re asked to relinquish their sidearms. I don’t know why, I¬†just fucking love that line and it makes me love Leo even more. :] Brilliant film, I suggest you check it out, seriously. Speaking of films, I’m overdue to see a new one. I’m thinking maybe The Crazies? That or I will seriously see Clash of the Titans. I’m not kidding. ;] I’ve been getting the full God of War III experience lately (game already finished )': ) and it’s renewed my love for Greek mythology. I bet that it’s no surprise that I love Hermes. He is the Greek god of Gay, after all. ;]]

So I made some banners of Teddy and Chuck and some others for a forum that I’m active on called Sxxxxxxx Cxxxx. I’ll put the link up somewhere so you can join since it’s such a fine community. ;] (It really is; ask for Kxx).

“soothingchaos.50.forumer.com/index.php”

Teaser:

//

Graphics can be found

Soothing Chaos

Miscellaneous .

Feel free to take any but please, please if you use any, make sure to credit! And tell me if you do take any, I’d like to see what you creative minds do with them. Thank you! :]] <3

As soon as the game came out I've been playing Heavy Rain and I'm absolutely head-over-heels in love with it. And with all the characters except for one (he knows who he is). Norman Jayden, agent 49023 FBI, is my favourite character right next to Ethan Mars, father of Shaun Mars. God, I've never loved a game like I love HR. And I even like the third character, Madison Paige. I¬†usually don't like female characters in video games since it seems like they never have a brain but boy does this one have one. And she can kick ass, too. Did I mention that I'm seriously in love? ;] So to begin, I made a few icons of Norman; I¬†hope to make a lot more featuring more of the characters as screenshots are released and I actually work on something. Ethan should be next, I¬†hope. Shutter Island: I¬†read the book before seeing the film and I loved both. My favourite line has got to be when Leo/ Teddy Daniels says, "We are two duly appointed Federal Marshals" when they're asked to relinquish their sidearms. I don't know why, I¬†just fucking love that line and it makes me love Leo even more. :] Brilliant film, I suggest you check it out, seriously. Speaking of films, I'm overdue to see a new one. I'm thinking maybe The Crazies? That or I will seriously see Clash of the Titans. I'm not kidding. ;] I've been getting the full God of War III experience lately (game already finished )': ) and it's renewed my love for Greek mythology. I bet that it's no surprise that I love Hermes. He is the Greek god of Gay, after all. ;]] So I made some banners of Teddy and Chuck and some others for a forum that I'm active on called Sxxxxxxx Cxxxx. I'll put the link up somewhere so you can join since it's such a fine community. ;] (It really is; ask for Kxx). "[soothingchaos.50.forumer.com/index.php](http://soothingchaos.50.forumer.com/index.php?noportal=1)" Teaser: // Graphics can be found

And tell me if you do take any, I'd like to see what you creative minds do with them. Thank you! :]] <3 mood: stressed, currently playing: "Requiem, K. 626, Lacrymosa" - Amadeus Soundtrack

items.title: 01/15/10, 05.20a // üí¨
items.content_html:
i’ve been unusually tired this week. i can go to bed as early as 5 pm. and i love sleep so i dont see the problem with that but i can see how my parents can worry over it. my mother to be exact. she always asks me if ‘something happened’ or if i’m depressed. those’re usually the only two reasons she usually comes up with. but nope - not either. i like that i can lie in bed and just think. and i have my yorkie warmers with me, of course. thinking is funnn. it really is. try it sometime.

ooh, i got my required texts today at chabot. all of the books in the Gay & Lesbian Literature class.. i wanna read ‘em all. they’re exciting. and one’s a graphic memoir! i love memoirs. love love love them. so i’m reading that one ahead of schedule >_>

i hate to do such short blogs but when i’ve got a graphic memoir to read and the want to get to bed & let Chloe settle in..i think i can cut it short.

oh, and i’ve been debating on whether or not i should post pictures of myself as i am now. (if anyone reads this) give me your opinion. the photo i’m using now is two years old /: and i really wish my hair was like that again. damn this impulsivity!

mood: uncomfortable,

(if anyone reads this) give me your opinion. the photo i'm using now is two years old /: and i really wish my hair was like that again. damn this impulsivity! mood: uncomfortable,

items.title: 07/29/09, 05.21p // this was, & i suppose still is, a su*cide note,
items.content_html:
i wrote it with my parents in mind. and i was serious. back then (july 29) still had easy access to the medicine cabinet.

[from my notebook] ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ i cant say that im sorry enough times to compensate for all the shit ive put you through. but i am sorry. ive felt like i was a waste of resources for a long time now. i havent done anything to help the family,only hurt it. im just a big disappointment& a waste of time. i hate myself for being the way i am [transgendered]. being something that you..probably hate. i hate it. i wish i wasnt this way. i wish i wasnt alive. this isnt anyones fault but my own. dont blame yourselves. i think life without me will be better,less negative and stressful. and it’ll put me out of my misery.

i’ll miss you, mom & dad. i’ll miss Mxxxxxx. i’ll miss Chloe. i’ll miss Bxxxxx. i’ll miss Jxxx. i’ll miss [my therapist],too. but i think that it’s for the best. sure it might hurt for a bit but maybe it’ll help to know that i’m not depressed anymore. maybe i’ll be happier,who knows?

again,i’m sorry for everything. i love you. xxxx E.R. ‚ô• ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ

i know this sounds like some whiny kid trying to get attention but i wasn’t that way. i meant everything i said.

i didn’t try to kill myself after i wrote this (i’m not sure what stopped me).

2 months and a week later i overdosed,for the second time,on 900mg of cymbalta and 300mg [i think] of valium.

happy stories,no? (:

items.title: 12/17/08, 07.44p // im tired of school
items.content_html:
[from my notebook]

im tired of school. im tired of your problems. when you talk about them it makes me so angry. stop whining and shut the fuck up. i dont broadcast my thoughts like you do. get away from me. youre too close to me. BACK¬†OFF. im sick of all those people.. theyre all just stale air and dead skin. i cant take this anymore. teachers play favourites. certain kids get special priveladges. “republican pride”. against gays. a school full of hypocrites and bigots. ok, fine, i dont care. cos i asked for your opinion? if i was like the rest of them life wouldnt be so hard,but im not..you dont know. so dont tell me you understand or youve “been there” cos you HAVENT. so shut up and stop talking about things you have NO¬†IDEA about.

xxxxxxxxxxxxx

its hard to breathe. i forget to do it sometimes. my head is all screwed up..its foggy and disorienting when i turn my head. (the day after i tried to overdose)
